root.description: OverviewLightFish is an action game developed and published by Eclipse Games for the PC, Mac, and Xbox Live Indie Games platforms.GameplayIn LightFish the player controls a fish. The fish leaves behind a line, which when closing off a section of a level will lock in that area.
